borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<div><font face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 11pt;">The proposed development presents a bulky addition that is not subservient to the original dwellinghouse and it would compromise the openness of the corner plot at the entrance to the cul-de-sac&nbsp;and unbalances the architectural composition of the estate's form. This is </span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">particularly</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;notable considering the proposal's location within a housing estate which presents minimal extensions and </span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">alterations</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;except single s</span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">torey</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;rear extensions. As such, it is considered to present visual harm to the surrounding street scene.</span></font>&nbsp;As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
National Planning Policy Framework </span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies CP2 and CP3 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core
Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF)
Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- The Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">

description: Construction of a single storey rear extension, a single storey front extension and a double storey side extension.
